tool_description: Purchase and sale transactions by stock insiders
name: Insider Trades
title: Insider Trades

api_list.name: single-ticker
api_list.description: Returns insider trades over the past year for a single stock ticker

api_list.name: all
api_list.description: Returns the most recent 1000 insider trades for all stock tickers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://insider-trades.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "insider-trades.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://insider-trades.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "insider-trades.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
